RESOURCE.USERID_MUST_BE_NUMBER: Invalid, request header userId must be number
RESOURCE.APPID_REQUIRED: Invalid, appId must have a number value
RESOURCE.APPID_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO: Invalid, appId must be greater than zero
RESOURCE.ROLEID_MUST_BE_NUMBER: Invalid, request header roleId must be number
RESOURCE.LOCATION_MUST_BE_NUMBER: Invalid, request header locationId must be number

DEFAULT.DATABASE_ERROR: There is an error in DB, Please contact IT support.
DEFAULT.INTERNAL_API_ERROR: There is an error in application integration, Please contact IT support.

USER_LOGIN.TYPE_INT: Invalid, request body type must be number
USER_LOGIN.MISSING_EMAIL: Invalid, request body missing email as username
USER_LOGIN.USER_SUSPENDED: Your user is suspended, please contact the FMS helpdesk

USER_LOGIN_PERSONAL_ID.TYPE_INT: Invalid, request body type must be number
USER_LOGIN_PERSONAL_ID.TYPE_STRING: Invalid, request body Personal Id must be in a string
USER_LOGIN_PERSONAL_ID.MISSING_PERSONAL_ID: Invalid, request body missing Personal Id
USER_LOGIN_PERSONAL_ID.MISSING_OTP_NOT_FOUND: Invalid, otp not found, expired or already consumed
USER_LOGIN_PERSONAL_ID.PERSONAL_ID_LENGTH: Invalid, Personal Id should be 8 characters

USER.ROLES_ACTIVE: Invalid, user role is still active
USER.MAX_CHAR: Invalid,  name must have a maximum of 50  characters
USER.NAME_FORMAT: Invalid, name must use string format
USER.MAX_ROLES: Invalid, roles must have a maximum of 5 fields

ROLE.REGEX: Invalid, Role name should be alphanumeric, symbol and space
ROLE.MAX_CHAR: Invalid, role name must have a maximum of 60 characters
ROLE.PERMISSION_VALUE: Invalid, access value (visible, enable, active) should be 1 or 0 only
ROLE.USER_MUST_HAVE_ROLE: Invalid, user must have at least one role
ROLE.INVALID_ROLEID: Invalid, the roleId value is invalid
ROLE.TOPIC_ID_NOT_IN_DB: invalid, topic id is not in database
ROLE.LEVEL_ID_NOT_IN_DB: invalid, the id level does not match the tipic id in the database
ROLE.ROLE_IS_SUPER_ADMIN: Invalid, request body isSuperAdmin must boolean true or false

ROLE_APPROVAL.IS_DELETED: Invalid, role approval has already been deleted
ROLE_APPROVAL.MAX_ROLE_APPROVAL: Invalid, roleApproval must have a maximum of 3 fields

PAGE.MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO: Invalid, page must be greater than zero

ROW.MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO: Invalid, row must be greater than zero

ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_COMPANY_ID: Invalid, missing company Id or must be an integer
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_BUSINESS_UNIT: Invalid, must have at least 1 Business Unit
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_BUSINESS_ID: Invalid, missing business unit Id or must be an integer
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_BRANCH: Invalid, must have at least 1 Branch
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_BRANCH_ID: Invalid, missing branch Id or must be an integer
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_LOCATION: Invalid, must have at least 1 Loation
ROLE_POSITIONS.MISSING_LOCATION_ID: Invalid, missing location Id or must be an integer
ROLE_POSITIONS.MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO: Invalid, location Id must be greater than zero

APPROVAL_LEVEL.MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO: Invalid, ApprovalTopicId must be greater than zero
APPROVAL_LEVEL.INVALID_APPROVALTOPIC_ID: Invalid, the approval topic id value is invalid
